meta.title: Aaron Molina | Jamstack Developer - Astro, Next.js, Sanity Expert
meta.description: Senior Jamstack developer with 12+ years experience. I build high-performance websites with Astro, Next.js, Sanity, and Tailwind CSS. Available for hire, remote US or Miami.

hero.name: Aaron Molina
hero.headline: Jamstack Developer
hero.description: I build fast, scalable websites that marketing teams love and developers enjoy maintaining. With {yearsOfExperience}+ years of experience, I specialize in headless CMS architecture, React, and modern web performance.

services.title: How I Can Help
services.subtitle: From concept to production, I deliver websites that perform

items.title: Jamstack Development
items.description: High-performance static and hybrid sites built with Astro, Next.js, or your framework of choice. Fast load times, great SEO, and easy content updates.

items.title: Headless CMS Integration
items.description: Connect your marketing team to a modern content platform. I specialize in Sanity, Contentful, and custom CMS solutions that scale.

items.title: Performance Optimization
items.description: Improve Core Web Vitals and page speed scores. I audit, optimize, and rebuild sites to meet Google's performance standards.

items.title: React & Frontend Architecture
items.description: Component libraries, design systems, and frontend infrastructure. Clean, typed code that your team can maintain and extend.

items.title: Senior-Level Experience
items.description: Over a decade of shipping production code for startups, agencies, and enterprise clients including Corsair, the LA Clippers, and Azamara Cruises.

items.title: Team Player
items.description: I integrate smoothly with existing teams. Clear communication, thorough documentation, and collaborative code reviews are my standard practice.

items.title: Quality Focus
items.description: TypeScript, testing, accessibility, and performance are not afterthoughts. I build with best practices from day one.

items.title: Reliable Delivery
items.description: Clear timelines, regular updates, and no surprises. I scope accurately and communicate proactively when things change.

blog.title: Latest Articles
blog.subtitle: Thoughts on web development, Jamstack, and frontend architecture

cta.title: Ready to Build Something Great?
cta.description: Whether you need a new website, a headless CMS migration, or help scaling your frontend team, I am here to help.
